Line1.6D03F: I wish we could. She’s out there with a Prime Evil. But, we’ve been instructed not to follow.
Line13.BAE4: No, you’re right about Neyrelle, friend. But there’s still work to be done in Sanctuary.
Line15.BAE4: I’m going to the Tree of Whispers.
Line19.BAE4: Because it might be our only ally left. And we may soon need allies more than ever.
Line21.6D03F: Fine, go see the Tree. But be very careful.
Line3.6D03F: Wouldn’t even know where to start searching if we did.
Line5.6D03F: So, until we know more, we’ll have to wait.
Line7.BAE4: I can’t just sit idly by, waiting for word.
Line9.6D03F: No? Then what are you going to do? Go after her, against her will?
MenuLabel: “Are we going to look for Neyrelle?”
VoiceDir21.6D03F: Both of these sentences should read as their own thoughts.
